Uses of Class
org.deeplearning4j.spark.parameterserver.training.SharedTrainingMaster.Builder

  • Packages that use SharedTrainingMaster.Builder 
    Package Description
    org.deeplearning4j.spark.parameterserver.training  

    • Uses of SharedTrainingMaster.Builder in org.deeplearning4j.spark.parameterserver.training

      Methods in org.deeplearning4j.spark.parameterserver.training that return SharedTrainingMaster.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.batchSizePerWorker(int batchSize)
      Batch size value, used for repartition purposes
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.collectTrainingStats(boolean reallyConnect)
      Enable/disable collection of training statistics
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.debugLongerIterations(long timeMs)
      Deprecated. 
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.exportDirectory(String exportDirectory)
      When rddTrainingApproach(RDDTrainingApproach) is set to RDDTrainingApproach.Export (as it is by default) the data is exported to a temporary directory first.
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.minUpdatesThreshold(double threshold)
      Once update with given threshold become too sparse, threshold will be decreased by thresholdStep, but not below minimum threshold Default value: 1e-5
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.rddTrainingApproach(RDDTrainingApproach rddTrainingApproach)
      The approach to use when training on a RDD<DataSet> or RDD<MultiDataSet>.
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.repartitionData(Repartition repartition)
      This parameter defines when repartition is applied (if applied)
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.repartitionStrategy(RepartitionStrategy repartitionStrategy)
      Used in conjunction with repartitionData(Repartition) (which defines when repartitioning should be conducted), repartitionStrategy defines how the repartitioning should be done.
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.rngSeed(long rngSeed)
      Random number generator seed, used mainly for enforcing repeatable splitting on RDDs Default: no seed set (i.e., random seed)
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.shakeFrequency(int frequency)
      During NN training, each X iterations, executors will send encoded dense updates with lower threshold.
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.stepDelay(int step)
      Wait at least X iterations between applying threshold decay Default value: 50
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.stepTrigger(double step)
      Target sparsity/dense level, when threshold step will happen.
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.storageLevel(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel storageLevel)
      Set the storage level for RDD<DataSet>s.
      Default: StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER() - i.e., store in memory, in serialized form
      To use no RDD persistence, use null
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.thresholdStep(double step)
      Step size for threshold decay Default value: 1e-5
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.transport(org.nd4j.parameterserver.distributed.transport.Transport transport)
      Optional method: Transport implementation to be used as TransportType.CUSTOM for VoidParameterAveraging method
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.updatesThreshold(double threshold)
      Threshold for updates encoding Default value: 1e-3
      SharedTrainingMaster.Builder SharedTrainingMaster.Builder.workersPerNode(int numWorkers)
      This method allows to configure number of trainer threads per cluster node.
